name: Buzzword Management Simulator
description:
You are the manager. The ethereal entity that controls those lesser than you.

You give your unique perspective as guidance and motivation to your employees. Shower them in management buzzwords to keep them awake.

See how long you can survive before they all fall asleep.

Instructions
You type the words that appear in red above the coders.
Press enter to submit the word. If you use the correct word the coder will be motivated and you will have prevented their inevitable sleep for a few more seconds.
You can backspace a single letter at a time.
